name: Outside (itch) (MHF_13)
description:
Team composed of
Oscar Canales Villar
Himar Bravo González
Judith Berenguer Guinovart
Mario Hernandez Fernandez
Marc Pavon Llop

In Outside you play as Josep, a child working on a textile factory, he misses the times when was on the field, one day he decides to change his life and escape from the factory.

key board:
move: WASD & Arrows
Jump: Space Bar
Interact: "E" 
Run: Shift

Pad:
move: Joystick 
Jump:  "X" PS contoller - "A" xbox Controller 
Interact: "[]" PS contoller - "B" xbox Controller
Run: "L1" PS contoller - "LB" xbox Controller

External assets:
Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.xn--com-5o0a/ 
Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.xn--com-5o0a/ 
Music from https://www.zapsplat.xn--com-5o0a/
